statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID DESC) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName , AA.LanguageCode , AA.PhysicalName , AA.LogicalName , AA.Description FROM dbo.TMessage AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1 AND AA.LanguageCode = #LanguageCode#
AND ( AA.PhysicalName LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' OR AA.LogicalName LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' )
ORDER BY RowNo

SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName , AA.LanguageCode , AA.PhysicalName , AA.LogicalName , AA.Description FROM dbo.TMessage AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TMessage ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, LanguageCode, PhysicalName, LogicalName, Description ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #LanguageCode#, #PhysicalName#, #LogicalName#, #Description# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update: UPDATE dbo.TMessage SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName# , LanguageCode = #LanguageCode# , PhysicalName = #PhysicalName# , LogicalName = #LogicalName# , Description = #Description# WHERE ID = #ID#
